entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Snow, 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 2:42 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Snow
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.2°C
Wind: SE 42 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or rain beginning near noon then changing to rain this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 13 January 2023
